meanings.definition: A test used to evaluate kidney function.
meanings.sent1: The doctor ordered renograms to check how well my kidneys are working.
meanings.sent2: After the renograms, the specialist analyzed the results to assess my kidney function.
meanings.sent3: The renograms showed that my kidneys are like detectives investigating their own health mysteries.
meanings.sent4: Her kidneys were like busy bees on a flower, buzzing with activity during the renograms.
meanings.sent5: During the renograms, my kidneys were under the spotlight, revealing their inner workings.

meanings.definition: The results of a renogram test.
meanings.sent1: The renograms indicated that my kidney function was normal.
meanings.sent2: I received the renograms report, showing detailed information about my kidney health.
meanings.sent3: When I saw the renograms results, I felt like a detective solving a medical mystery.
meanings.sent4: His renograms results were a clear picture of his kidney function, like a snapshot in time.
meanings.sent5: The renograms report painted a vivid picture of my kidneys' performance, like a health report card.
